Articles.Content:
My attempt to recreate Venera 9, soviet unmanned mission to planet Venus. Venera 9 (4V-1 No. 660) consisted of an orbiter and a lander. It was launched on June 8, 1975 02:38:00 UTC and had a mass of 4,936 kg (10,884 lb).The orbiter was the first spacecraft to orbit Venus, while the lander was the first to return images from the surface of another planet.

Pictures, details:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I'm planning to make regular youtube video series with recreations of real missions, alternative history and some fictional ideas in RSS & RO.

New Horizons recreation will be released tomorrow (July, 14th).

My next plans: Voyager 2 (september) Manned Venus Flyby (october)

Edited July 13, 2015 by winged
